item.title: Thoughts about the next 10 years. Version 2022
item.description: In order to know where to put efforts, time and money one has to understand which areas of technology, science and culture are experiencing break-through and which are stagnating. In a booming sector/country/company everything is helping to reach a success. Even if you are a mediocre specialist you probably gain a good portion of experience and the career can go higher. During a crisis you easlity get unlucky even if you are high-profile expert.
